title: Ela Cheppanu
overview: Ela Cheppanu (Telugu: ఎలా చెప్పను, English translation: How Should I Say?) is a Telugu film starring Shriya and Tarun, directed by Ramana. It is the remake of the Bollywood hit movie Tum Bin.  Tarun ... Sekhar  Shriya ... Priya  Siva Balaji ... Amar Varma  Tanikella Bharani  Brahmanandam  Giri Babu  Sowcar Janaki  Kovai Sarala  Sunil
